IoT.JS

Fastest and easiest way to build IoT devices

Getting Started

What is IoT.JS

IoT.JS is a node library that helps software developers and hardware makers build IoT devices with JavaScript. We provide high level APIs help you control sensors and devices.

Getting Started

Install IoT.JS

$ npm install iotjs

Send PM2.5 Data to Data Cloud

Code for a PM2.5 air quality station, send data to a data cloud service through REST API and hava capability of accessing the sensor data throught REST API automatically generated by IoT.JS.

var iotjs = require('iotjs');
var request = require('request');
// Define a PM2.5 sensor instance.
var aq = new iotjs.Sensor.AirQuality({ type: 'pms3003', rate: 60000 });

// Send data to data cloud.
aq.on('data', funciton(data) {
  request.post('REST_API_URI', { form: { data: data } });
});

// Run REST server.
var data = new iotjs.Data(aq);
iotjs.rest({ route: '/aq/data', data: data }, 8080, function() {
  console.log('Air quality station is listening on port 8080!');
});

Sensor Data Through REST API

The REST API URI of getting sensor data is http://device.domain.name:8080/pm25/data.

[
  { "pm25": 66, "datetime": "2016-05-15T12:44:06.249Z" },
  { "pm25": 63, "datetime": "2016-05-15T12:43:00.555Z" },
  { "pm25": 63, "datetime": "2016-05-15T12:41:55.265Z" },

  { "pm25": 60, "datetime": "2016-05-15T12:38:39.341Z" },

]
